issue.title: refactor: Remove unused includes from wallet.cpp
issue.body:
This makes compilation of wallet.cpp use a few % less memory and time, locally.

Created in the context of https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/28109, but I don't think it is enough to actually fix this problem.

events.body:
ACK fa32af22b323e7c58b6b20af6517f4795a72cdc5

The `async_handler` was unused since its introduction, so I don't think it's worth it to keep it around.

comments.body: Style nit: These pragmas could be indented like they are here: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/src/util/strencodings.h#L20 , or did you omit any automatic formatting to maintain order?
Maybe change this to "These messages could be used to dispatch async notifications to an async handler"?
I wasn't sure if the includes must come in a specific order. I've pushed a new commit to re-order them, which can be easily reverted, if there are issues.
